attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2014-0970

Date: 2014-09-19

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Julie Dickson, former Superintendent of Financial Institutions, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range ($308,800 - $363,300), effective April 1, 2014.

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of William J. S. Elliott, Special Advisor to the Minister of Public Safety and Emergency Preparedness, to be styled Special Representative of INTERPOL to the United Nations, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range ($219,100 - $257,700), effective April 1, 2014.    His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Robert W. Paulson, Commissioner, Royal Canadian Mounted Police, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range ($219,100 - $257,700), effective April 1, 2014.
attachmentText:
PC Number: 2014-0970Date: 2014-09-19


	 	 His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Julie Dickson, former Superintendent of Financial Institutions, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range ($308,800 - $363,300), effective April 1, 2014.


	 	 His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of William J. S. Elliott, Special Advisor to the Minister of Public Safety and Emergency Preparedness, to be styled Special Representative of INTERPOL to the United Nations, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range ($219,100 - $257,700), effective April 1, 2014.	 	 His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, hereby fixes the salary of Robert W. Paulson, Commissioner, Royal Canadian Mounted Police, as set out in the schedule hereto, which salary is within the range ($219,100 - $257,700), effective April 1, 2014.
